Text.name: Text0
Text.content: The opencms-importexport.xml covers the configuration of import/export related features. In the DTD for it. all the configuration possibilities are briefly described. Thus, the file is a good, thought very technically, overview for theses features. In particular for the static export configuration.

LinkEntry.Text: DTD for the opencms-importexport.xml - The file where static export is configured.
